column2: A full-course dinner, and a testament to Halfling culinary expertise.
Complementary dishes found through centuries of Halfling striving for culinary perfection.
With rare and expensive ingredients, the true genious and madness of Halfling cooking can finally be expressed.
A varied selection of expertly crafted dishes.
With an ice cellar extension, the restaurant's offer can be enriched by fresh seafood.
Exotic and expensive ingredients can truly unlock the Halfling culinary mind, and the customer's purse.
An all-you-can-eat buffet adored by the poorer classes.
More tables and more dishes to better serve the hungry masses.
This restaurant is now a genuine tourist attraction. Lower classes pay pilgrimage to this culinary den.
Troll meat? But good Sir, this is not that kind of establishment.
Finest Bretonnian vintages, some of them even actually from Bretonnia.
A rare treat for the affluent and bored, as well as a great way to display wealth.
An empty barn with hay bedding that can accomodate fellow Halflings.
A table always kept reserved for Halfling travelers. While the merriment does wonders for the body and mind, it is at odds with the call of the road.
In this furtive room Halflings discuss the security of the Moot and the whole Old World.
Halflings are not thieves, but they do have a knack for finding lost things. And a knack for making sure things become lost.
